alert.note: Alert for Lonoke; Pulaski; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 1:21PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lonoke, south central White and northeastern Pulaski Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 121 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Little Rock AFB. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sherwood... Jacksonville... Cabot... Little Rock AFB... Beebe... Ward... Austin in Lonoke County... Old Austin... Parnell... McRae... Gravel Ridge... Sylvania... South Bend... McAlmont... Garner... Macon... Butlerville... Woodlawn... This includes the following highways... Interstate 440 between mile markers 13 and 14. US Highway 67 between mile markers 5 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
